message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product at a price of $1400000.  I believe it represents excellent value considering its worth to you. I'm open to discussing this further if you have any questions.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1200000 is unfortunately too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1350000. This price still allows me to make a profit while offering you a significant discount from my initial offer. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $1250000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. While $1250000 is closer to my ideal price, I'm still not quite there. I'm willing to go down to $1300000.  This is a fair price for both of us.  Let's make this deal happen!

I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1200000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I hope we can agree on this.
